channel.title: Need help with loading screen EDITED!
channel.description:
when i type a server in it logs me in then it takes like FOREVER to load when it says loading please wait
can someone tell me how to fix that? EDIT: giving 800k rs cash away if someone tells me how to make the lagg go away
